name: User Authentication Flow
description: Secure login/signup for web and mobile users

content.problem: Users cannot access the platform. No account system exists. This blocks all personalized features.
content.users: New users who want to create accounts and returning users who need to log in.

user_stories.story: As a new user, I want to create an account, so that I can access personalized features
As a returning user, I want to log in, so that I can access my saved data
acceptance: Invalid credentials show clear error message

user_stories.story: As a logged-in user, I want to stay logged in, so that I don't have to re-enter credentials every visit
acceptance: Can manually log out when needed
Session expires after 30 days of inactivity

content.constraints: Must comply with GDPR for EU users. No SMS verification due to cost. Launch within Q1.
success_criteria: Session persists for 30 days on trusted devices
Zero security vulnerabilities in auth flow
